name: Mushy's Escape
description:
This game is unfinished. For now, a single mechanic is available, which is soul ejection and possession, and it is bugged. In the current state, the game is an empty level with enough to test the previously described mechanic.

Use WASD to move, Q to eject soul and E to possess bodies. You must be facing at bodies to possess them while being a ghost.

3D models are pending.
